page.title: 05RELIGION IN ERSKINE
page.content: Seven churches can be found within Erskine, two of which are Roman Catholic churches, St. John Bosco and St. Bernadettes. The other five are - The New Baptist Church,The Church of the Nazarene,The Scottish Episcopal Church,The Church of Scotland and The Old Parish Church. The churches are well attended, except for the Scottish Episcopal Church which has only a small congregation each Sunday. Two of the churches meet in Bargarran Community Centre to hold their services. The oldest of the church buildings is the Old Parish Church in Ferry Road, Bishopton. Unfortunately, the churches do not meet the religious requirements of foreigners who come to Erskine.
